toll.parking.library

Class ParkingHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • toll.parking.library.ParkingHandler

  • public final class ParkingHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton ParkingHandler is responsible for handling parking and unparking of vehicle and calculating fare based on uses.
    Author:
    ashokv
